title: Firefox /WinApps with save dialog save as permissions denied / a simple permissions error?
body:
Hello,

Update!!! All WinSoftware that want to save a file/save dialog causes this.

when i try to save an download from firefox on an folder or drive mounted encrypted rclone volume the firefox freezes and when i'm close the cmd-shell firefox says that i don't have permissions.

I have all cache modes tried.

But when i make an Junction-Link (symbolic folder) to that mounted folder or drive it's functioned very well.
Update!!!!
Not the junction-link was it, i have an zero byte downloaded file and firefox has replaced the file, that why the download sav as has functioned. Looks more like an permission error? Replace an zero byte file will be functioned.


How i say make Junctions to rclone mounts is great, smile, but directly from firefox will be great or will resolve other permission mount errors from me under windows mount.

thx
cypu

i have debuged fuse

